data.name: Grisaia Phantom Trigger Theme Song EP
data.detailed_description:
Opening/Ending Theme EP for GRISAIA Phantom Trigger.
Includes 4 tracks in both WAV and MP3 formats.


1. Edge Of My World
Vocals: Marina Kawano
Composition & Arrangement: Hitoshi Fujima(Elements Garden)
Lyrics: Yoshikazu Kuwashima

2. A Simple Wish
Vocals：Hiromi Sato
Lyrics ：Yoshikazu Kuwashima
Composition：Noriyasu Agematsu(Elements Garden)
Arrangement ：Hitoshi Fujima(Elements Garden)

3. Edge Of My World (instrumental)

4. A Simple Wish (instrumental)


Note: This EP is sold as DLC, and thus the files will be downloaded to the folder in which the game is installed.
You can check the installation location of the game by right-clicking the game in the Library section of the Steam client and select Properties, followed by clicking "Browse Local Files..." on the "Local Files" tab.
WAV:44.1kHz 16bit
MP3:192kbps
